attributes.action: request Her Majesty to disolve Parliament as the Population of the UK have no confidence in its members .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Members of Parliament have lost the confidence of the people who elected them.
The PM should advise the monach of this fact and she would take the appropriate action

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
